description: Developed smart contracts and decentralized applications on the Ethereum blockchain. Learned blockchain fundamentals, contract logic, and DApp integration.

Worked as a Full Stack Developer Intern at A.P. Moller Maersk, contributing to the development and enhancement of enterprise-grade applications. Actively involved in building and maintaining backend services using C#.NET, developing responsive and modular frontend components with Angular, and integrating applications with Azure cloud services. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement RESTful APIs, manage SQL-based databases, and ensure secure, scalable, and high-performance solutions. Gained hands-on experience with cloud-native development on Azure, including application configuration, deployment, and monitoring. Additionally, participated in data-driven problem-solving, where regression and classification techniques were explored for analytical use cases, strengthening understanding of real-world business data workflows and system optimization.
